title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka, Nevske of Luhansk region and Torske, Serebryanka of Donetsk region, - Gene...
content: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Makiyivka, Nevske of Luhansk region and Torske, Serebryanka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
